decision_conditions: The cumulative nature of the proposed changes is considered to be a material change to planning permission 19/02142/FUL and as usch the changes are not considered to be non material.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Non Material Amendment to Planning Permission 19/02142/FUL (Variation of condition 2 (drawings) of planning permission ref 16/13215/FUL (Erection of a part ground and first floor, part first floor and mansard roof extensions to existing building to facilitate 8 self-contained units comprising 1 x 1 bed and 7 x 2 bed units and the erection of a two storey building comprising 2 x 3 bed pair of semi-detached dwellinghouses and associated landscaping, cycle and refuse storage.) to facilitate minor exterior alterations.) to provide:- Configuration of dormers on main front elevation of 14 dormer windows within the mansard roof.-Removal of doors and windows on the southern end of ground floor of principle elevation.-Removal of windows on ground floor of southern elevation-Alteration to windows on rear roof slope, replacing curved window design with sqare casements used on site.
